titleStmt.title: A more full answer of John Bastwick, Dr. of Phisick made to the former exceptions newly propounded by another wellwiller to him, against some expressions in his Letany, with his reasons for the printing of it. All set downe as more articles superadditionall vpon superadditionall, against the prelats. This is to follow the Letany as a fourth part of it.
Litany. Part 4
titleStmt.author: Bastwick, John, 1593-1654.

publicationStmt.date: in the yeare of the English prelats malice, and crualty, against and upon Gods faithfull people, 1637.

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The fourth part, of the Letany of Iohn Bastwick, Doctor of Phisick.
Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.
